resources:
DeviceApiSample Settings
Module Desc: Message： clean
This demo needs to allow all permissions to run, please give all permissions in settings - application - DeviceApiSample
When used on the C10 terminal, before using, please give all permissions in settings - application - DeviceApiSample
Pinpad MagCard Reader ICCPUCard Reader PSAMCard Reader SyncCard Reader SIM Serial Card Reader RFCPUCard Reader MifareOneCard Reader IDCard Reader Printer SerialPort CashBox Sign Panel C10 Subscreen Device C10 Digled Device Algorithm SystemInterface SubscreenActivity Camera Scanner Inner Scanner External Scanner Led Beeper PAR ParameterFile Interface
Search Card Stop Search Card Power Card Halt Card Exist APDU Exchange Read Data Write Data Auth Block Add Value Reduce Value Change Password Read Card Status Test IO Open Close Init Device Type Load Keys Entry Pin Calc Mac Encrypt TD Data Encrypt Data Decrypt Data Start Print Front Scan Back Scan Start Scan Stop Scan Start Beep Stop Beep Start Sign Display Clear Start Flash Stop Flash Digled Info Start Activity On Subscreen Start App On Subscreen Set Subscreen App Remove Subscreen App Get Subscreen Info Send Data Calc Data Update Datetime Reboot Device Info Exist First Run Read Parameter Write Parameter Device Type Inner External Card Type Slot Num Slot 1 Slot 2 Slot 3 Slot 4 Baund Rate Data Bit Bit 7 Bit 8 Parity None Odd Even BR200 Scanner Serialport Scanner Parameter Type Boolean String please input module name please input file name please input parameter name please input parameter value，boolean type needs input true/false
This module supports the terminal with beeper device, such as A8,P990 and W280PV3. this module is not supported for C10, P960, W280P and W280PV2.
AT1604Card AT1608Card AT24CxxCard SIM4428Card SIM4442Card This module is used to introduce the basic operation of all kinds of sync cards, including AT series cards(AT101, AT102, AT1601, AT1604, AT153, AT1608, AT24Cxx) and SIM series cards(SIM4428 and SIM4442) This module is the operation example of sync cards , including AT101, AT102, AT1601 and AT1604 card This module is the operation example of sync cards , including AT153 and AT1608 card This module is the operation example of AT24Cxx card This module is the operation example of SIM4428 card This module is the operation example of SIM4442 card
This module can be used directly in the terminal with RF module, otherwise, the external deivce needed to be called. For inner RFCardReader, RFCardReader should be initialized by calling getInstance() method, and search card with RFCardReader.OnSearchListener, For external RFCardReader,RFCardReader should be initialized by calling getOtherInstance(\"EXTRFCARD\") method, and search card with RFCardReader.OnSearchListenerEx.
This module can be used directly in the terminal with RF module,otherwise, the external deivce needed to be called. When using external device, RFCardReader should be instantiated by calling getOtherInstance() method by passing in the deivce name EXTRFCARD. and search card with OnSearchListenerEx.
This module can be used in the terminal with SAMV module. This module can be adapted to W280P terminal at present, Other terminals are not supported for the time being.
According to the different types of terminal access CashBox distinction. There are appropriative cashBox port in C10, A8 and other terminals need to be connected through a base or a conversion line.
Scanning code with camera. The A8 terminal has a front and back camera for different scannings. Other terminals, like A7, W280P and C10, have only functions of back scanning with only back camera. In addition, the precondition of scanning is that the terminal has been integrated with the scanning library.
This module can be used in the terminal with scanning hardware, like P990 ,P960 and so on.
This module supports external scanning devices.
This module can be used directly in the terminal with Pinpad module,otherwise, the external deivce needed to be called. When using inner Pinpad, Pinpad should be instantiated by passing in the device name IPP. When using external device, Pinpad should be instantiated by passing in the device name COM_EPP.
The terminal should use external printer if there is no inner printer, like bluetooth printer and so on. This sample is aimed at inner printer.
This module can be used directly in the terminal with RF module, otherwise, the external deivce needed to be called. For C10, W280P terminals and so on, When the pinpad module is being used, the RF operation object should be instantiated by passing in the device name "EXTRFCARD".
This module can be used in the terminals that supports the sign panel and the versions of master control and sign panel driver meet the requirements(like S160 pinpad).
This is appropriative interface for C10 subscreen, which is used to interact with the guest screen. This module only can be used in C10 terminal with dual screen.
The sample activity projected onto the guest screen. .
This module is appropriative interface for digital tube of C10 single screen, and can be used to intercat with digital tude. This module only can be used in C10 terminal with single screen.
This module is used to get the system information, like SN, and restart the terminal and update the time.
par parameter file operation
